original_text: The three oldest sons of Jesse had followed Saul to the battle. And the names of his three sons who went to the battle were Eliab the firstborn, and next to him Abinadab, and the third Shammah.
korean_text: 그 장성한 세 아들은 사울을 따라 싸움에 나갔으니 싸움에 나간 세 아들의 이름은 장자 엘리압이요 그 다음은 아비나답이요 셋째는 삼마며

sentences.original_text: The three oldest sons of Jesse had followed Saul to the battle.
sentences.korean_translation: 이새의 맏아들 셋이 사울을 따라 전쟁에 나갔더라.

sentences.original_text: And the names of his three sons who went to the battle
sentences.korean_translation: 전쟁에 나간 그의 아들 셋의 이름은
